column5: Downtown Kitchener Location:Â 61 King St E, Kitchener, ON N2G2K4 upload image
Wow, did you leave any behind?
Left them all there, don't need another rod at the moment, but I took pics & thought I'd post as I found it interesting that they had a brand name rod available there.
Most of your big name rod brands make budget models too, although 4 bucks is dirt cheap, I wouldn't expect it to be much besides a fishing rod.
This ^. I picked up $10 Daiwa from CT one day (just for a kid). It did not survive one weekend.
Check carefully - it only says shimano on the tag not the rod...
When you see a Shimano for $4 just keep on walkin.

Hey itâ€™s a $4 rod...if I was close to Kitchener Iâ€™d buy 3-4 just to give out to my neighbours kids. Thatâ€™s how kids get into fishing and enjoying the outdoors. Not starting with Stradics!! Letto, pm me the address of the Dollarama as I may be in Cambridge this week. Thereâ€™s 4 young boys on my street that might need a new rod!

Address of the store for the RodsÂ is in the OP it's rod only, not a combo, so If you need a reel to go with it, I visited the Highland Hills location yesterday (875 Highland Rd W, Kitchener, ON N2N 2Y2) to see if they had any Fraser Farm Meatballs & Gravy that I saw there in the pastÂ (sadly I never saw any)Â & saw they had Zebco 202 Spincast Reels there for $4:
I remember as a kid having a spincast zebco...was allowed to put a weight on it only and I would practice casting in a fieldÂ for hours.

If you see it , get it . This rod originally sold at Walmart as a combo included the reel. A lot of them the reel got stolen so it sell the whole lot to Dollarama. I purchased the combo and it works great.
